Posts.Content: calichick wrote: Hi Guys...I posted about my Stereotactic experience in another post...just waiting for the results...so nervous...but this is about taking off the sticky, cling wrap-like bandages off my oh so tender girls. I am still sore...had my biopsy on Thursday...unfortunately I gave them a challenge...my calcification clusters were deep in the tissue and my boobs were way too thin to handle so it was a bit difficult having to put some rings on me to thicken up my boobs to do the procedure. Nonetheless, it got done...the staff was awesome and i am just contemplating on how to remove these bandages when they look like they've been stuck on with crazy glue? And I don't want to removed the steri strips along with it. Has anyone else experienced this? How did you guys remove the bandage without squirming? Any help appreciated! Thanks!
